message: Bob, accepting this offer immediately is in your best interest. If you delay, the value of your share will drop by 10% each round, and in equilibrium you can expect nothing. I propose that you take this offer now to avoid further losses.
Alice, a fair split! 60/40. The longer we wait, the less my share is worth. Accept now for a guaranteed 400k for you.

Bob, time is moneyâ€”literally. If you reject, you'll get to propose in round 4, but your share will suffer a 30% inflation penalty, effectively capping your value at around $700000. By accepting now, you secure an offer worth 80% of your nominal amount (i.e. $875000 nominal becomes $700000 in real terms). This deal matches your best alternative, so why risk further devaluation? Accept and let's close this.
